sources.title: The 2026 Midterm Elections Are Just Around the Corner
sources.snippet: As the 2026 midterm elections approach, candidates are gearing up for what promises to be a highly competitive race.

metatags.og:title: The 2026 Midterm Elections Are Just Around the Corner
metatags.og:description: As the 2026 midterm elections approach, candidates are gearing up for what promises to be a highly competitive race.

sources.rationale: Provides a high-level overview of the upcoming 2026 midterm elections, directly addressing the core of the knowledge gap.

sources.title: FEC Congressional Budget Justification FY 2025

metatags.og:title: FEC Congressional Budget Justification FY 2025
metatags.og:description: The Federal Election Commission's budget justification for the fiscal year 2025.

sources.title: Department of Government Efficiency (DOGE) Update 2025
sources.snippet: An update on the status and initiatives of the Department of Government Efficiency (DOGE) as of 2025.

metatags.og:title: Department of Government Efficiency (DOGE) Update 2025
metatags.og:description: An update on the status and initiatives of the Department of Government Efficiency (DOGE) as of 2025.

sources.rationale: Directly provides a status update on DOGE, which is the primary focus of the knowledge gap.

sources.title: Secretary Rollins Takes Bold Action to Stop Wasteful Spending and Optimize USDA to Better Serve American Agriculture
sources.snippet: Today, U.S. Secretary of Agriculture Brooke Rollins addressed more than 400 USDA staffers, stakeholders and friends and pledged to bring greater efficiency...

metatags.og:title: Secretary Rollins Takes Bold Action to Stop Wasteful Spending
metatags.og:description: In a bold move, Secretary Rollins has committed to eliminating wasteful spending within the USDA and optimizing its operations to better serve American agriculture.

sources.rationale: Content is relevant to government efficiency, but the PDF is malformed and causes a parsing error during the ingestion process.

ingestion_status.trace:
Traceback (most recent call last):

    text_content = extract_text(pdf_file)
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.12/site-packages/pdfminer/high_level.py", line 85, in extract_text
    if not doc.is_extractable:
pdfminer.pdfdocument.PDFEncryptionError: PDF document is encrypted.
